sentences.sentence: Kidder supplies exact coordinates to Eric Uhlhorn, a scientist seated beside me.
sentences.translation: 基德为埃里克·乌尔霍恩提供准确坐标，后者是坐在我旁边的一位科学家。

sentences.sentence: But Kidder will not be CEO of the new entity, which will be called Chrysler Group LLC.
sentences.translation: 但是基德尔不会总裁的新的实体，这将是所谓的克莱斯勒集团有限责任公司。

sentences.sentence: "Being Lois lane" featuring interviews with Noel Neill, Margot Kidder, Dana Delaney and Erica Durance.
